about.intro: I am an AI Automation Specialist from Hyderabad, India, passionate about building intelligent systems that transform how businesses operate. I specialize in designing and deploying AI chatbots, voice bots, and automation workflows that streamline processes and boost productivity.
about.description: With hands-on experience creating 60+ AI chatbots and 5+ voice bots, I help companies automate customer support, HR operations, and internal workflows. I also manage CRM automations using GoHighLevel, ensuring seamless client interactions. Beyond automation, I create tech content on YouTube and Instagram to help others learn and grow in the AI space.

services.title: Prompt Engineering
services.description: Crafting effective prompts for AI models, chatbots, and automation workflows to maximize accuracy and efficiency.

services.title: AI Bots
services.description: Built 60+ AI chatbots and 5+ voice bots for healthcare, HR, billing, and customer support operations.

services.title: Tech Content
services.description: Creating educational tech content on YouTube and Instagram to help people understand and learn AI and automation.

services.title: Automation
services.description: Building CRM automations, workflows, and integrations using GoHighLevel to streamline business operations.
